messages.content:
# SEO Audit Report – TrendThread

**Site:** https://trendthread.com

## Executive Summary
- **Critical Image Issues:** 1 image missing alt text, 3 images exceed optimal file size.
- **Potential Impact:** Poor accessibility, slower page load times, lower Core Web Vitals scores.
- **Overall Priority Score:** **High** (70/100).

---

## Detailed Image Optimization Findings
### 1️⃣ https://trendthread.com/product/blue-dress
| Image Source | Alt Text Status | File Size (KB) | Recommended Alt | Compression / Resize Recommendations |
|---|---|---|---|---|
| /images/blue-dress-1.jpg | **Missing** | 1200 | **Blue dress front view** | Resize to ≤1200 px width; convert to WebP (quality 75) |
| /images/blue-dress-2.jpg | Present ("Blue dress side view") | 950 | – | Resize to ≤1200 px width; convert to WebP (quality 80) |

### 2️⃣ https://trendthread.com/product/red-sneakers
| Image Source | Alt Text Status | File Size (KB) | Recommended Alt | Compression / Resize Recommendations |
|---|---|---|---|---|
| /images/red-sneakers.jpg | Present ("Red sneakers on white background") | 1400 | – | Resize to ≤1200 px width; convert to WebP (quality 70) |

---

## Actionable Recommendations
1. **Add Missing Alt Text** – For `/images/blue-dress-1.jpg`, use the suggested alt: **"Blue dress front view"**.
2. **Resize Images** – Any image wider than 1200 px should be scaled down to improve load speed.
3. **Convert to Modern Formats** – Export all product images as **WebP** with the quality settings listed per image.
4. **Automate Future Checks** – Integrate an image‑optimization workflow (e.g., CI pipeline) that enforces alt‑text presence and size limits.

---

## Next Steps
- Implement the above changes within the next sprint.
- Re‑run the SEO audit after updates to verify improvement in Core Web Vitals.
- Consider a periodic (monthly) audit to keep image assets optimized as new products are added.

*Report generated by SEOAuditPro.*

Here is the full SEO audit report for TrendThread, focusing on image optimization.
